New York City faces a potential snowstorm with 1-2 inches expected Sunday night, prompting winter operations advisories from the Sanitation Department, while a recent spike in violent incidents raises safety concerns amid ongoing weather challenges and significant updates in local governance and infrastructure projects.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC snow forecast predicts 1 to 2 inches possible Sunday night after deadly freeze.
